I chose the auto-reset  option, but my program still says 30 days left of the trial. Is that supposed to happen? I see someone else said that theirs showed 800+ days left...

I would not recommend using this antivirus. It automatically deletes files without any warning or confirmation screen and there does not seem to be a way to undelete them after it happens. Really really bad. Get an antivirus that actually cares about what YOU think of your files.
